name: Extent of what is within the archival object is unclear
description: Repository is incapable of determining the parts of the archival object that will be subject to ongoing preservation.
notes:
- Does repository define the scope and extent of its archival package format(s)?
- Do policies and procedures exist to validate archival packages for completeness and correctness? 

The full description of this risk has been obtained from examples provided in DRAMBORA - Digital Repository Audit Method Based on Risk Assessment, March 2007, Digital Curation Centre (DCC) and Digital Preservation Europe (DPE), http://www.repositoryaudit.eu/
preMitigationNotes: - Repository fails to adequately define its archival package format
mitigationStrategy:
